import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import Post from './Posts' import {Link,Redirect} from 'react-router-dom' import queryString from 'query-string'; class Home extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ email:this.props.match.params.id, category:'' } this.props.isAuthed(this.state.email); this.props.setHeaderState(true); window.scrollTo(0, 0) } handleClickCategory=(event)=>{ console.log(event.target.name); this.setState({category:event.target.name}) } render(){ { console.log('category in home',this.state.category)} return (
